attributes.action: STUDENT TUITION FEES TO BE REDUCED TO HALF AND REFUNDED
attributes.additional_details:
Students are not getting the full university experience and also do not have use of the facilities. This is also having a massive effect on student mental health across the country due to the coronavirus restrictions
students should have their tuition fees refunded to them. Many students have moved into university halls and accommodation and where under the impression they would be attending class, only to be informed a week before that there is not much face to face learning.
attributes.background: Where is the student tuition fees going? Having to pay £9250, us students are not getting £9250 worth of education when I am sitting at my laptop watching the screen all day. The government should refund and reduce tuition fees for students at university. Refund and respect students.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to fully refund tuition fees for the Autumn term: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555583
